title: Did Giuliani Tweet That Sex With Barnyard Animals Was Spreading COVID-19?
subtitle: President Trump's lawyer, Rudy Giuliani, tested positive for COVID-19 in December 2020.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump's lawyer Rudy Giuliani tweeted that it was "likely that all these people that have contracted the China Virus got it from having sex with barnyard animals."
